item.description:
We had a great time on the last Harbor Cruise so we are bringing it back again in July!

We received such great feedback from our cruise earlier in June we decided to team up again with Boston Ski and Sports Club for another evening cruise around Boston Harbor. So, join us on the Provincetown II, Friday, July 10th for a spectacular sunset accompanied by music, dancing, drinks and fun!

What the cruise will include:

Top Deck: Live music from Close to Home, bringing you songs from the 80's through today that you can dance to against the backdrop of the Boston Skyline. .

Mid Deck: DJ Mike Gioscia spins up the top dance hits.

Bottom Deck: Games and prizes ('corn hole' anyone?).

Each deck has a cash bar with beer, wine and mixed drinks.

Schedule:
BOARDING: 7:15PM on "Provincetown II". (Cash bar opens 7:30PM)
CRUISING: 8:00PM to 11:00PM. Rain or shine, 21+ ID required.


Suggested Attire: Business Casual

Directions:
"Provincetown II"
Commonwealth Pier
Boston, MA 02210
At the intersection of World Trade Center Ave and Seaport Blvd.


Cost: $15.00
If purchased by 7/6/09
purchase tickets at www.thingstodoboston.com
item.name: Boston Summer Sunset Harbor Cruise
